tool_description: Generates and validates authorization codes for approved transactions, ensuring uniqueness and proper formatting.

gateway_auth_code.description: Authorization code received from payment gateway

error_messages: Invalid transaction ID: Transaction ID must be provided and non-empty.
Invalid gateway authorization code: Gateway auth code format is invalid or empty.
Authorization code generation failed: Unable to generate internal authorization code.
Duplicate authorization detected: This transaction already has an authorization code.
Amount mismatch: Transaction amount does not match authorization request.
usage: Provide transaction_id, gateway_auth_code from successful payment processing, merchant_id, and transaction_amount. Returns formatted authorization details.
